templateName: HR Executive First Round Interview Mail
subject: Interview for Jr. HR Executive with Excellence Technologies
body:
Hello #candidate_name,

With respect to your application, we have shortlisted you for an interview for the post of Jr. HR Executive

Interview Process:

HR Round & F2F Technical Round.

Your allotted time slot for the interview is on #scheduled_date

Time Slot: #scheduled_time

Location: 

Excellence Technologies,

C-86 B, Second Floor (C Block)

Sector 8, Noida

Landmark: Near Toyota Showroom & Dealers.

U.P. 201301

 

Google Map:

https://www.google.co.in/maps/place/Excellence+Technologies/@28.5967589,77.3264066,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x390ce4fc8c75d9e5:0x4ea29a8e67042fb9!8m2!3d28.5967589!4d77.3285953

Please send a confirmation mail as a reply to this mail in case you will be available for an interview at the allotted time slot.

#logo

#mahima_sign

subject: Your Job Application at Excellence Technologies
body:
Hello,

Thank you applying for the post of Jr. Web Developer at Excellence Technologies. Below you will find a brief about the Company and Selection process.

Company Profile

We are India based IT Services company found in August 2009, with the vision to provide Excellence in Software Solutions. We work with US clients on web development projects. Our current team strength is 45+ and we are operating from Sector 8 Noida.

To process your application faster, let us know the following:

1. Describe your internships, training taken briefly. 

2. Why do you want to join Excellence Technologies.

Current Location:

Current CTC:

Expected CTC: 

#simple_footer

subject: Your Job Application To Excellence Technologies.
body:
Hi Mr. Anoop,

Thank you very much for taking the time to interview with us for the Business Development Executive Profile. We appreciate your interest in the company and the job.

I am writing to let you know that we have selected the candidate whom we believe most closely matches the job requirements of the position.

We do appreciate you taking the time to interview with us and encourage you to apply for other openings at the company in the future.

Again, thank you so much for your time, Wish you all the best.

#logo

#hr_footer

subject: Walk-In for Graphic Designer (FEMALE ONLY), February 23, 2018 (Friday)
body:
Hello,

We are looking for a talented Graphic Designer (FEMALES ONLY)  to create amazing user experiences. The ideal candidate should have an eye for clean and artful design, possess superior user interface design skills.

 

As our Graphic designer, you would be required to:

• Design, execute and manage all Graphic design projects assigned to you

• Up-to-date with the latest Graphic design trends, techniques, and technologies

• Understanding of web & mobile design

You should be proficient in the below mentioned softwares and skills:

• Adobe Photoshop

• Adobe Ilustrator

PORTFOLIO MUST, PLEASE INCLUDE YOUR PORTFOLIO LINK IN THE CV AS WELL. CANDIDATES WITHOUT PORTFOLIO LINK WILL NOT BE CONSIDERED.

 

Time Slot: 10am - 3pm

Location: #location

 

#logo

#mahima_sign

templateName: WALK IN DRIVE FOR WEB DEVELOPER
subject: Walk-In Drive Interview For Jr. Web Developer
body:
Hello,

Thank you for applying for the position of Jr. Web Developer at Excellence Technologies.

We have walk-ins on Monday 12th March 2018 from 11:00 am for this position.

If you are interested please be present with your updated CV.

We are looking for candidates with 0-1 yrs experience (Freshers Also) with good technical skills and a good attitude.

We prefer candidates from Delhi/ NCR region only.

Graduation/ Post Graduation Passing Year 2016 and above!

Required Skills: PHP, HTML, CSS, Jquery, Javascript.

Interview Process:

1. Two Online Test Papers.

2. HR Round & Technical Round.

#hrtemplate_signature

Location:

Excellence Technologies,

C-86 B, Second Floor (C Block)

Sector 8, Noida

Landmark: Near Toyota Showroom & Dealers.

U.P. 201301

Note: If you had appeared for any of the interview processes with us in past 6 months for the same profile, please do not participate in walk-ins.

subject: WALK-IN INTERVIEW SCHEDULED FOR JR. PHP DEVELOPER
body:
Hello,

Thank you for applying for the position of Jr. PHP Developer at Excellence Technologies. 

We have walk-ins on Monday to Friday 18th Dec to 22nd Dec at 11:30 am for this position. .

If you are interested please be present with your updated CV.

We are looking for candidates with 0-1 yrs experiance (freshers also) with good technical skills and good aptitute. 

Vist our website https://excellencetechnologies.in/ and facebook https://www.facebook.com/ExcellenceTechnologies/ to know more about us.

 

Note:- only genuine candidates are applicable for the interview process
